events.title: Cat Adoption Day
events.description: Find your new feline friend at this event.

events.title: Community Garden
events.description: Join us as we tend to the community food garden.

events.title: Beach Cleanup
events.description: Come cleanup the lake and enjoy free food, games, and fun after we're done.

events.title: Block Party
events.description: Come to the park downtown for fun, food, and family. Outdoor movie starts at 9pm.

events.title: Interstate Cleanup
events.description: Help I-35 and I-94 look a little nicer.

events.title: Pack Food Kits for Families
events.description: Help build, pack, and deliver food kits for families in need all around the metro.

events.title: Dog Walk and Play
events.description: Help walk dogs from the local shelter and play with them in the dog park. Help families interact with potential adoptees.

events.title: Beach Cleanup
events.description: Come cleanup the lake, again, and enjoy free food, games, and fun after we're done.

events.title: Community Garden
events.description: Celebrate the garden and all its fruits by helping harvest our yield. Take home for everyone.

events.title: Holiday Gift Drive
events.description: Help take in gift donations, wrap them, and deliver them to families in need this holiday season.
